headline.main: Schumer Calls Passing Health Act in 2010 a Political Mistake

docs.abstract: Senator Charles E. Schumer said Tuesday that it was a political mistake to pass the Affordable Care Act in 2010 because voters at the time were looking for relief from the recession — not universal health care.
docs.snippet: Senator Charles E. Schumer said Tuesday that it was a political mistake to pass the Affordable Care Act in 2010 because voters at the time were looking for relief from the recession — not universal health care.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Department of Veterans Affairs fired the director of its Phoenix medical center, Sharon Helman, months after it was revealed that wait lists were manipulated to cloak long delays.

headline.main: Health Care Delays Lead to Ouster of Veterans Hospital Director in Phoenix
headline.print_headline: Hidden Delays for Veterans’ Health Care Lead to Ouster of Hospital Director in Phoenix

docs.abstract: Veterans Affairs Dept fires Sharon Helman, director of its Phoenix Center, six months after it was revealed that hospital employees had manipulated wait lists to hide long delays many veterans faced to see doctors; Helman had previously been placed on administrative leave, but was formally removed after pressure from Republicans in Congress.
docs.snippet: The Department of Veterans Affairs fired the director of its Phoenix medical center, Sharon Helman, months after it was revealed that wait lists were manipulated to cloak long delays.

headline.main: Lawmakers Look for Ways to Provide Relief for Rising Cost of Generic Drugs
headline.print_headline: Lawmakers Look for Ways to Provide Relief for High Cost of Drugs

docs.abstract: State and federal lawmakers are searching for ways to help patients struggling to pay high cost of drugs; prices of common generic medicines have jumped 500 percent or more in past 18 months, and continue to soar.
docs.snippet: With the prices for some common generic medicines soaring over the past 18 months, state and federal lawmakers are trying to find relief for patients struggling to pay.

headline.main: You Can Freeze Your Eggs. You Can't Freeze Time.

docs.abstract: Apple and Facebook have started a useful conversation with the novel perk of enabling employees to freeze their eggs. But I have a message for women considering this option: it may not work.

headline.main: Answering the Hard Questions on the A.C.A.: Which Employees Must Be Covered?
